name: Normandy SR-1
lore: Logged: The Commanding Officer is ashore. XO Pressly has the deck.
Equalizing interior pressure with exterior atmosphere.

name: Space Hamster
lore: In space, no one can hear you *squeak*.
It's kinda like a Space Gerbil... except, more Hamster-y.

name: Shepard VI
lore: My personality matrix can predict what the real Commander Shepard would say with seven percent accuracy.
There's nothing this galaxy can't beat if we all work together.

name: T.A.R.D.I.S.
lore: Time and Relative Dimension in Space.
It's... bigger... on the inside!
It's... smaller... on the outside!

name: Sonic Screwdriver
lore: It doesn't do wood!
Who looks at a screwdriver and thinks 'Ooh, this could be a little more sonic'?

name: Fish Fingers and Custard
lore: Pears are too squishy and they make your chin wet.
Would you like a jelly baby?
Always take a banana to a party, Rose.

name: Rocinante Model
lore: This is the warship Rocinante, you’re aware of our capabilities more than anyone.
Any ship that opens fire on us will feel the sum-total of our state-of-the-art Martian arsenal rammed up its ass.

name: Miller's Hat
lore: Keeps the rain off my head.
Doors and corners, kid. That's where they get you. Doors and corners.
I didn’t kill him because he was crazy. I killed him because he was making sense.

name: Proto Molecule Sample
lore: Can't stop the work. Can't stop the work.
It reaches out, it reaches out, it reaches out, it reaches out. One hundred and thirteen times a second, nothing answers and it reaches out.
The aliens that sent the protomolecule hadn’t needed to destroy humanity. They’d given humans the opportunity to destroy themselves, and as a species, they’d leaped on it.
